text: (achchha to) mujhe (kaheen se) lohe kee sile la do (chunaanche vah log) lae aur ek badee deevaar banaee yahaan tak ki jab dono kangooro ke darameyaan (deevaar) ko buland karake unako baraabar kar diya to unako hukm diya ki isake gird aag lagaakar dhauko yahaan tak usako (dhaunkate-dhaunkate) laal angaara bana diya
